name: ` Siphon
description: A memory card containing the skill "Siphon" which can be inserted into a phone.

name: Upgrade
description: A firmware upgrade on a floppy disk. Can be used to upgrade one stat of a phone.

name: Screwdriver
description: Can be used to repair phones a little.

name: Auto Screwdriver
description: Can be used to repair phones a good amount.

name: Repair Kit
description: Can be used to combine the parts from two phones to create one better condition phone.

name: Spare Battery
description: Restores a phone's battery by a little bit.

name: Extended Battery
description: Restores a phone's battery by a good amount.

name: Super Battery
description: Restores a phone's battery by a lot.

name: Power Bank
description: Revives a dead phone with 50% battery.
